stalwart_create_account.description:
Create email account with password. Set name, email, quota, description.

    Creates a new mailbox account. The name becomes the username for login.
    Always list accounts first to avoid duplicates.

    Args:
        params: CreateAccountInput containing:
            - name: Username (required, e.g., 'john')
            - email: Primary email address (required)
            - password: Account password (required, min 8 chars)
            - description: Display name (optional)
            - quota: Mailbox quota in bytes (optional)

    Returns:
        Confirmation with account details.
